attributes.action: Have a national 'Bring Your Dog to Work Day'.
attributes.background: Lighten the mood in the office by having everyone being their dogs in as long as their temperament is suitable.

rejection.details:
This isn't something that the Government is responsible for. There is already a "Bring Your Dog to Work Day" which is organised by a charity. You can find out more here:

https://bringyourdogtoworkday.co.uk/
